Player History
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/11/1986 to a 2-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Traded from Toronto to San Diego on 3/4/1986 (Going to SD: RF Mark Whiten. Going to TOR: CF Kevin McReynolds)...
Injured on 7/27/1989 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/28/1991, off Bruce Ruffin (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/3/1991, off Kevin J. Brown (ATL)...
